EmailTemplate.name: MSF Data Request (Academic)
EmailTemplate.subject: Your IHS Markit Customer Care Case {!Case.CaseNumber} - Markit Securities Finance Data Academic Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for expressing an interest in IHS Markit's securities financing data.
Before we proceed with your request please could you clarify the following:
1. Your full contact details, including your position at the University; 2. Intended use of the data, i.e. the provisional title of the research paper and a brief synopsis; 3. Do you have a research grant to purchase Securities Finance content and if so, for how much? 4. Are you currently using market data from any other source and if so, who? 5. Are you collaborating with any co-author(s) from the same or any other institution(s)? If so, please can you confirm their full contact details (including position at the University)? 6. Intended distribution (if any) for the paper and 7. The scale, region or description of data required.
If you require any further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us.
Kind regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName} IHS Markit | Customer Care
